basics.name: Anaya Cole
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.CT. in Creative Technologies, conjoining Computer Science and Design programmes. I am in the Department of Future Environments at AUT, and now studying Computer Sciences in the Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2024, and pursue postgraduate study after.

interests.name: The intersection of Biomimicry and Technology

education.institution: University of Hawaii, Honolulu, HI, Auckland University of Technology

work.summary: Interning in a team that was exploring AI solutions to existing problems within Google
highlights: Designing, Ideating and Building prototypes of AI models to improve google services
Lead intern for my team, spearheading the ideation and creation of our project
Using figma to design key elements within the creation of the starups website
Implementing my designs into react components, alongside a design team

volunteer.summary: Head of organising internship, faculty and other student opportunities for the club
highlights: Working alongside my fellow board members to provide a bridge between students and STEM industries

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
